Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Reactive oxygen species modulator 1 (ROS modulator 1; pigs, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus, Mycobacterium tuberculosis;Gram-negative bacterium:Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against a variety of bacteria. Acts by inducing bacterial membrane breakage (By similarity). Induces production of reactive oxygen species (ROS) which are necessary for cell proliferation. May play a role in inducing oxidative DNA damage and replicative senescence. May play a role in the coordination of mitochondrial morphology and cell proliferation (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Generation and analysis of cDNA sequences derived from a porcine skeletal muscle library.
Literature.Author: Cai G, Chen Y, Wang C, Li J, Peng G, Zhang H.
